scenario_text.value: Was...was there someone here just now?

That’s weird. I don’t see anyone, but I feel
like we’re being watched...

Hmph... They’re still there. They’re not as
hard to sense as before.
Wh-what does that mean? Are we getting close?

I’m not sure. It’s just easier to sense them
now. However...
Yes... I’m not picking up any ill will.
